# sortDescriptors

**Instance Property**

An array of sort descriptors that specify the order of the results returned by this query.

## Declaration

```swift
var sortDescriptors: [NSSortDescriptor]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the value passed to the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentQuery/init(documentType:predicate:limit:sortDescriptors:includeDocumentData:resultsHandler:)] method’s `sortDescriptors` parameter.

## Accessing the Document Query’s Properties

- **includeDocumentData**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the sample includes the full document’s data.
- **limit**: The maximum number of documents the receiver will return upon completion.
